featured.text: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a feature that would trigger earworms? (A) Tunes repeatedly encountered.
In 2011, a minister, Ryu Matsumoto, was forced to resign after only a week in office, when a bad-tempered encounter with local officials was televised.
When people encounter a complex issue and form an opinion, how thoroughly have they 26 all the important factors involved before they make their decisions?
Wildlife encounters are unforgettable experiences for children and adults alike.
In fact, a visit to a major European city just would not be the same 16 encountering them: bathing in fountains, perching on historic buildings, and flocking in public squares.

definition.en_def: To come across or meet someone or something unexpectedly.
definition.example: I had an unexpected encounter with an old friend at the café.
